name: Wrestling Games Revolution 3D
description:
Welcome to the world of super stars wrestling fight revolution it seems to be a real freestyle-wrestling
tournament that have different levels of multiple wrestler’s matches. Our latest free wrestling games
will give you chance to fight against world superstars in world wrestling competition with HD quality
graphics & advanced fighting games play modes. Wrestling game especially designed for professional
wrestling lovers. World super star wrestling offers multi-man fighting experience in this ultimate
wrestlers fighting game. Professional wrestling game is combines with real multiplayer fighting actions.
Select different wrestlers with advanced fighting styles & techniques. Use special wrestling skills and
amazing combo power to take down energy of your rival.

Wrestling Game Play Modes & Wrestlers Selection:
In this Wrestling Rumble fighting sports game, the gameplay is very simple and easy. This wrestling
action sports games developed in three amazing & different modes. First, you need to choose your
favorite wrestler & than select a Battle Mode. Battle mode consist of three different fighting gameplay
modes like Story Mode, Career Mode and Knockout Mode.

Wrestling Knockout Mode:
In “knockout Mode”, fighting mode, which features top wrestlers challenging in different fighting levels.
However, keep in mind, no second chance in knockout mode. Knockout match wining will increase the
power, intensity, and excitement of real wrestling fights revolution game.

Wrestling Career Mode:
In “Career Mode” after every success in fights will earn you some points to unlock next levels. Unlock
new fighting challenge. Career mode consists with different & latest action sports games play challenges
against world wrestling champions. Challenging the next rivals to become the best fighter in this mode.

Wrestling Story Mode:
Story mode is all about real life of wrestling stars, behind every fight there is and personal vengeance,
which will increase the intensity of rage against rivals in the wrestling ring. First time in the history of
wrestling; in Story mode wrestlers personal clashes will converted into the personal fights in different &
latest games play challenges.

Daily Rewards:

In “Daily Rewards Mode”, you will earn bonus points daily that will help you to unlock next players,
ultimately getting more points will upgrade power, speed, and accuracy with new strikes and fighting
styles. Earing maximum points to unlock next level by watching rewarded videos.

Game Wining Rewards:
Earn points for each wining against opponent, fight against strong wrestlers and level up your wrestling
skills to get top-level ranking. Upgrade your power, speed, and accuracy with new strikes and fighting
styles getting points for each winning match.

Freestyle Rumble Wrestling: PRO Multiplayer Fights Game Features:

- Enjoy three Different fighting games play mode to test your wrestling skills
- Defeat all heavyweight superstar wrestlers in “Story Mode”
- Play in “Career Mode” and win against world top fighters
- Extreme challenging “Knockout Mode” will test your fighting skills
- Face toughest wrestling warriors and become king of the ring
- Heavy weight champions fight against world wrestling superstars
- Choose player among mixed male and female wrestlers
- Real wrestling rivals in action with extreme fighting motions
- Win wrestling matches & get rewarded points to unlock next challenge
- Background music & sound effects will boost your energy
